reviews.review: La unica queja que tengo es el tiempo de busqueda de partida, pero por lo demás un juegazo

„Oh shit, I just shit my pants“ - Leonardo da Vinci, presumably, after being stalked by Michael Myers.

Now, I gotta say: I really do have a Love/Hate-Relationship with this game. In the game four survivors are hunted by one homicidal maniac, who is trying to stab or slash them with a blunt or sharp object. For people living in Texas or in the German town Wuppertal this is nothing new, however, if you don‘t, this game delivers an experience no other game can deliver.

I like both, playing killer and survivor therefore I can say the game can potentially be great fun.
Some rounds though, feel like having sex for the first time. They are short, frustrating and the end result is rather disappointing. 

Playing with friends on the other hand is mostly fun: „Survive with friends“ means that  you are trying to survive together against one random killer, where you will mostly just fake trying to help your companions, while in reality you are searching the hatch to be able to escape alone after their demise.

In „Kill your Friends“ you will have the opportunity to play the killer yourself. This is great for telling you friends that „it’s just the games mechanics“ so you don’t have to admit that you are a sadistic asshole.

Having said all this this game really is worth it most of the time, while some moments will be frustrating (but as you might already know this is true for most games). If you are not sure if this is for you, get it in a sale and definitely play it with friends.

„Damn, I hate those loopers“ - maybe Oscar Wilde, while chasing Meg Thomas for 5 minutes straight.
Просто не надо и всё. Поищи игру получше

Nie polecam kupna tej gry ani grania w nią, devsi chcą robić jedynie Dodatki to dbd, by w jakiś sposób zarobić wraz z BHVR. Nie robią żadnej optymalizacji, słabsze komputery mają problem (w tym przypadku ja) Ludzie sobie robią tylko geny, nawet nie pomogą innym. Co raz bardziej toksyczni ludzie, którzy udawają siebie za najlepszych a nimi nie są, wyzywają bez przyczyny, t-bag umią tylko robić. Życzę tej grze by ona kiedyś upadła lub by devsi zrobili jakąś optymalizacje, aż mi się nie chce grać w tą gre. A więc nie wydawajcie na tą gre, BHVR robi tą gre na lepsze kompy, dlatego nie wydawać na tą gre tylko kupcie sobie lepszy procek wraz z kg

Newest character drops ruins the game for everyone. Nice gaming hours if you never like succeeding in a video game. The learning curve compared to the amount of people either smurfing in game or just playing the sweatiest characters known to man makes the game a disappointment at best. Honestly a waste of money having to play hide and go seek with someone who spots you on the map anyways and proceeds to tunnel the entire time you try to play. Friday The 13th did a better job at making a terrifying set of different variations of one killer with a set of different survivors than this game ever will. Dead by Daylight is a chore to play as a survivor and isn't even worth playing as a killer 

GAMEPLAY(Survivor):
Just wander around the map attempting to fix generators that a killer can break anyways until they are officially complete, as well as making sure you don't get hit by a killer whose wide range and ability to be faster than you automatically guaranteeing him a hit. If you do get hit, just try to find a teammate to help you out and heal you, oh you can't find them because they don't show up on the map at all for you unless you play a specific character? too bad, oh a character has self heal? shit doesn't matter because the killer is just gonna follow you anyways. Oh but what about the flashlight or the planks you can throw down? doesn't matter cause the killer hits you through them or has a spas attack during your flashlight and does a spin attack that automatically hits you anyways. 

GAMEPLAY(KILLER): Honestly it's not really that fun, playing different killers is cool and all but no proximity chat, no friends, and no decent perks while the other people on the team are a 4 man or 3 man against you? its boring. 

THE GAME:
Its buggy at times, generators are boring to do, getting hit by the killer doesn't terrify me it just irritates me, and overall dying doesn't feel worth it because you put in most of the work and lose anyways, the hatch didn't spawn one time while I was playing and there was nothing I could do but die and try to find a match for 30 mins. The matchmaking isn't fun, the time to wait isn't fun, the perk system doesn't seem worth it because the Killer is just faster than me.


OVERALL SCORE: 5/10
The game is boring, but it's graphics are good, its killers are interesting, and they have different survivors with each separate set of perks, it was scary in the beginning, but the repetitive dying in dead by daylight and constant loosing makes the game not fun. The game doesn't feel like it has anything fun to it other than I need to keep dying in order to level characters up to actually START the learning curve. This definitely isn't something you can just pick up and want to have fun with unless you have friends. Dying over and over again isn't fun, and neither is putting so much effort into one character just to have all of these items and not being able to use them with another character that you just started with.

Ótimo jogo para se divertir com amigos. A mecânica de um assassino ser controlado por um jogador torna a experiência assustadora, fazendo com que os sobreviventes e assassino criem estratégias e se adaptem diante das situações repentinas. A diversidade de sobreviventes e assassinos cria uma ligação do jogador com o personagem, fazendo com que o jogador tenha seus favoritos e tenha à disposição um leque de possibilidades e combinações. O modo competitivo é difícil para iniciantes, devido à idade do jogo e a quantidade de jogadores veteranos. Minha sugestão é juntar grupos de amigos e se divertirem. Ao jogador solo, boa sorte subindo de rank e se divirta com a competição.
PLaying with friends at 12 is dope
